verse: Hear this word which I take up over you in lamentation, O house of Israel:
Therefore thus says the Lord, the God of hosts, the Lord:

header: The Day of the Lord a Dark Day

verse: “Did you bring to me sacrifices and offerings the forty years in the wilderness, O house of Israel?
You shall take up Sakkuth your king, and Kaiwan your star-god, your images, which you made for yourselves;
therefore I will take you into exile beyond Damascus,” says the Lord, whose name is the God of hosts.
